io.werval.util

Class Strings

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.werval.util.Strings

  • public final class Strings
extends Object
    Utilities to work with Strings.

      • rightPad

        public static String rightPad(int length,
                              String string)
        Right pad a given string with spaces. If the given String length is greater than length, the String is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        length - Total length of the padded String
        string - String to pad
        Returns:
        Right padded String
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if length is negative

        string - String to pad
